Dapr-PWSH.commandLineArgs: -Command "Start-Process http://localhost:5006/swagger; dapr run --app-id workflow --components-path dapr-local/ --config dapr-local/configuration.yaml --app-port 5006 --dapr-http-port 3500 --dapr-grpc-port 50007 --log-level Debug -- dotnet run --no-build --urls http://localhost:5006"
